column1: A title given to Faramir by Aragorn
column2: who granted him the hills of Emyn Arnen for his residence as Prince of Ithilien.

column1: Emyn Arnen were Gondors lands east of the Anduin and the homeland of Stewards of Gondor Húrin of Emyn Arnen
column2: the patriarch of the House of Húrin and ancestor of Faramir.
